projects.title: Oracle HCM (TalentLink MSS) - ServiceNow Integration | Self Service Transactions to generate HR Case
projects.description:
Talentlink (Oracle HCM) Self Service Transactions to generate an HR Case in ServiceNow HRSD application. 

Talentlink (Oracle HCM) application provides a Self-Service functionality for Manager or HRBP, which allows you to perform transactions/action directly to their direct reports or an employee, such as change location, change manager, compensation change, and terminations, etc. many more in Talentlink Self Service Portal. However, as part of the end-to-end process the transactions committed in TalentLink involves manual intervention by HRBP/Manager for approval within Talentlink, once approved a manual HR Case in s@S should be submitted for the same, so that updated info for a respective employee is also up-to-date in down-stream application in their respective to their region/country which is currently managed by HR Services team, which was more a manual activity for manager/HRBP.

This use-case was built to automate the process using RPA – Blue Prism Bot will interact with both applications Talentlink and s@S(ServiceNow HRSM). Once the transaction is completed in Transactions in Oracle HCM with automated approvals. The bot will do the necessary steps on Oracle HCM and completed self-service transactions will be posted to the ServiceNow HR Case Management application to create the “Talentlink Request” HR Case via ServiceNow Platform API with a specific category with all transactions details and automatically assigned to the respective country HR SupportDesk team.

projects.title: RPA - Tenancy Letter for Employees Automated | ServiceNow - Box
projects.description:
A UK/IRE- based Employee submits a 'Letters and Certificate Request' HR Case asking for Employment/Tenancy Letter in s@S Employee Self Service portal. UK/IRE People Link agent team verifies the HR Case and generates a certificate with employee data found in Talentlink. Agent sends Certificate attachment via:
-	For Internal Employees: Certificate is directly attached to the ticket and sends a password separately.
-	For External Employees(Not Employee UK): Certificates are sent directly to the requestor and save the certificates in the Box folder as per guidelines.

This use-case aims to automate the entire using RPA-Blue prism, all such requests from employees are validated by HR Agent and an HR Task is assigned to Bot to generate and issue the certificate in specific letter format for both internals and externals. The bot will also automatically update the info back to HR Task with Letter in the attachment marks it is as closed and the same letters also uploaded to appropriate legal-entity/employee Box-folder.

projects.title: RPA - Vacation Request - PTO for Employees | TRESS (Payroll System) - ServiceNow Integration
projects.description:
The PTO process involves different systems and it all starts with support@Schneider(s@S) - HR Case Management application ( ServiceNow), where the employee introduces the vacation request, specifying the days and attaching the approval of his/her manager. After the employee raises the HR Case, the HR Case is going to be assigned automatically to the PeopleLink Mexico queue and will be revised to check that ticket contain all the information required.

If the employee does not specify the detail of the days he is going to request or does not attach the manager approval, this is when PeopleLink Mexico contacts the employee to request the missing information. This interaction is through email. (Outlook) If the ticket contains all the information required, PeopleLink Mexico will enter the software TRESS to start the input of the vacation days in the systems. There are not operational constraints during this manual process. TalentLink can be used to lookup the payroll number of the employee and locate the employee in TRESS or PeopleLink Mexico can go directly to TRESS and lookup employees by names.

PeopleLink (HR ServiceDesk) Mexico will validate those days were registered correctly in TREES(Time Management/Payroll Application), and if everything matches correctly, the s@S HR case request will be marked as completed by PeopleLink Mexico, it's important to mention that the resolution of the ticket includes additional information of the vacation balance and inquiry of the employee. Since this type of request represents more than 50 % annually of the tickets that PeopleLink Mexico, it's imperative that the resolution template contains this information to meet employee expectations. This resolution template is filled manually by PeopleLink Mexico.

This use-case is developed to completely automate the above process when an employee submits a ‘Vacation request’ HR Case in support@Schneider.

projects.title: Automate Employment Certificate Request - using SAP and ServiceNow
projects.description:
An Employee based in France submits a 'Letter and Certificate Request" HR Case - requesting an "Employment Certificate" from support@Schneider Self Service portal-it is a one-stop-shop for all your HR Needs, it assigned to HR PeopleLink France L1 team, L1 team validates the request and also does a lookup based on the employees Legal Entity and specific payroll code and assigns specific France HR Payroll Specialist who is part of France Payroll L2 team, now Payroll Specialist will access the SAP application, and gets all the required information to build an "Employment Certificate" in French and submits the certificate via email or by post to the requested employee and mark HR Case as resolved/closed. This current process involves manually check to assign the corresponding payroll administrator and creating a certificate by reading more than 14 different information from SAP is a lot of time-consuming and more manual prone to copy-paste mistakes. 

This use-case aims to automate the entire process using RPA, by assign "Employment Certificate" HR Case directly to Bot, which will read the HR Case details including the user info, letter type, and access the SAP tool to generate the document as per standard template in France and update the same as attachment to HR Case and mark HR Case as "Closed".

projects.title: Automated - Employee Job Date Change for CIS - Boss Kadrovik | Oracle HCM | ServiceNow
projects.description:
Workforce Administration in the CIS region faces struggles with several challenges on daily basis. Different data set has to be changed and provided in both Boss Kadrovik and Oracle HCM. Moreover, the input file has to be developed and rules to be created to meet the expectations of both, HRBP and Workforce Administration site. 

Other challenges were presented below:
•	Double work on manual data entry due to the fact of having 2 systems: local one – Boss Kadrovik and Schneider Electric global solution – TalentLink (Oracle HCM)
•	Routine in performing repetitive tasks
•	Delay in data delivery and Complexity of input template 
•	The challenge is also to receive a complete data set from HRBP, which require checkouts and additional emails or ticket(HR CasE) rejection at Support@Schneider (S@S) 
•	HRBP claims and changes status checkouts are time-consuming. In its current form, the probability to make errors is high and so is the amount of time that is required to handle all cases. 

HRBP submits a "TalentLink Request" Service Catalog Item in Self Service Portal ( ServiceNow) with type/subcategory "Employee Job Data Change request" with a mandatory attachment in the desired format which contains all the required changes to CIS region employees. 

"Talentink Request" HR Cases are automatically assigned to CIS HR HelpDesk Team, the HR Agents will validate the data provided by HRBP in the HR Case and create the required spreadsheet in the desired template and with a security lock on the file, which is attached to new HR Task and it will assign to Bot profile. The bot is designed to read all the HR tasks assigned to it and process all the required steps in Boss Kadrovik and TalentLink, if all the transactions/operations are successfully on both applications, the bot updates the information to HR Task and closes the HR Task in s@S. 

We automated the process with RPA and ServiceNow to reduce the overall costs, time to complete, and error probability.

projects.title: Requesting Copy of Labor Work automated for BWC Employees via Email ( ServiceNow)
projects.description:
Creating an HR case [Letters & Certificate / Copy of Labor Work] from email data for BWC Employees in Russian Federation. 

BWC (Blue Collar Worker) employees submit their request/inquiry using (eform.schneider-electric.com) which sends an email to the distribution email list maintained by the Russian HR Peoplelink team. Agents read the email and create relevant HR Cases in support@Schneider most common are the Letter and Certification Request and Copy of Labor Work Request. CIS Russia Team wanted to automate this process by allowing Bot to process the content of the email which Employee submitted on the self-service form(e-form) by looking at specific keywords including the employee information. If required keywords are found in the email, then Bot will create a "Letter and Certificate" HR Case and If the keywords do not match, Bot will create a "Copy of Labor Request" HR Case and assigns it to the CIS Russia Peoplelink team.
